page.title: 14FARMING SAMPLE STUDIES
page.content: Cont.from page 13. materials as the farm-house but the new ones have a steel frame with concrete walls and asbestos sheeting on the roofs. The total acreage of the farm is 126 acres.There are 37 acres of wheat,23 acres of barley,14 acres of potatoes, 24 acres of oil seed rape,6 acres of peas and 22 acres of permanent grass. Ten acres of the grass are cut for hay and the rest is grazed by cattle.The fields are bordered by hedges.The soil is medium to heavy but does not need any special treatment.However,drainage pipes have been laid.The farmer uses all the hay,straw and half the barley on the farm.The wheat is sent to King's Mill at Knottingley for bread flour.The potatoes are either sold to a potato merchant or the Potato Marketing Board.The peas and the rest
